title: Mastery Tokens not being given.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: One match i finally got an S- for my second mastery 6 token, and for some reason it did not give it to me when i clearly should have.

replies.body: It looks like that match was played on the rotating game mode All Random Summoner's Rift. We were made aware of a [**typo in the patch notes**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) stating that ARSR would give mastery tokens, but this is not correct. It is not intended for you to be able to get mastery tokens on ARSR.
